All species: You have to recognise all species.
challenge description: You will run through different levels. It will start easy, but it will get harder. The final level will be a thorough. Let's see how far you get.
country challenge description: You will run through different levels. Some easy and some quite difficult.
country challenge warning: WARNING! This is still in development. Some features will not work as expected. Please send any feedback through the form on the homme page.
country summary: {country} has {speciesCount} species, in {orderCount} orders and {familyCount} families.
failed description: Ouch! That was one wrong answer too many...
flag modal title: Can you tell us what was wrong with this question?
how many questions: How many questions do you want to answer?
question: Questions
question flagged: Question flagged. We'll look into this.
set language description: This changes your language. Other players that join your game can pick another language.
success description: Well done! You've successfully completed this level. Ready for the next challenge?
waiting for host: Waiting until the {host} starts the game.
waiting for host to click next question: Waiting for {host} to continue to the next question
your name: What's your name. You can pick any name you want.
